Interface CycleState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseUpdateState, FiringRulesState, SolvingGoalState

    interface CycleState
    This is the interface to implement in order to add steps to the cycle. Currently there are three steps.
    Author:
    Albex
    See Also:
    CycleHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handlerMethod(CycleHandler STATE_CONTEXT, String NAME)
      Handler method for the state name.

    • Method Detail

      • handlerMethod

        void handlerMethod(CycleHandler STATE_CONTEXT,
                 String NAME)
        Handler method for the state name. Override it to allow the step to act.
        Parameters:
        STATE_CONTEXT - is the CycleHandler that owns the state.
        NAME -
